ai_business_context: A demo environment for staff to triage and close the loop on facility feedback.
ai_categorization_instructions: Prefer specific categories. When unsure, use `other` and add a short note to internal context.

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: spill, leak, wet floor, slippery, puddle, mop, flooding
issue_categories.description: Spills, leaks, wet floors, and slip hazards.
issue_categories.label: Spill / Slip Hazard

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: toilet, urinal, sink, faucet, hand dryer, soap, paper towel, restroom, bathroom
issue_categories.description: Restroom fixtures, supplies, and cleanliness issues.
issue_categories.label: Restroom

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: trash, garbage, bin, overflowing, recycling, litter
issue_categories.description: Trash, recycling, and waste management issues.
issue_categories.label: Trash & Recycling

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: hvac, air conditioning, ac, heat, heating, thermostat, too hot, too cold, ventilation
issue_categories.description: Heating, cooling, and ventilation comfort issues.
issue_categories.label: HVAC / Temperature

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: light, lighting, bulb, flicker, dark, lamp, emergency light
issue_categories.description: Lighting outages, flickering, and visibility issues.
issue_categories.label: Lighting

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: door, lock, badge, access, keycard, gate, broken latch
issue_categories.description: Doors, locks, access control, and entry issues.
issue_categories.label: Doors & Access

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: elevator, lift, stuck, out of service, call button
issue_categories.label: Elevator

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: stairs, handrail, step, trip, uneven, carpet edge, threshold
issue_categories.description: Trip hazards and walking surface issues.
issue_categories.label: Trip Hazard / Walking Surface

issue_categories.description: Noise complaints affecting comfort or work.
issue_categories.label: Noise

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: wifi, internet, network, printer, kiosk, screen, tablet, qr code
issue_categories.description: Connectivity and shared equipment issues (printers, kiosks).
issue_categories.label: IT / Equipment

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: parking, garage, lot, pothole, stripe, charging, ev
issue_categories.description: Parking areas, markings, and related amenities.
issue_categories.label: Parking

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: safety, fire extinguisher, alarm, exit, emergency, first aid
issue_categories.description: Safety equipment and emergency readiness issues.
issue_categories.label: Safety / Emergency

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: clean, dirty, dust, vacuum, stain, odor, smell
issue_categories.description: General cleanliness and odor issues outside restrooms.
issue_categories.label: Cleanliness

issue_categories.description: Use when no other category fits. (When unsure, choose this and add a short note to internal context.)
issue_categories.label: Other

comments.body: Thanks—this is the main restroom for visitors, so quick turnaround would be appreciated.

issues.description: Women's restroom (1st floor) is out of paper towels; dispenser is empty and the backup stack is gone.

reports.body: No paper towels in the women's restroom. Hand dryer works but a lot of people prefer towels.
No paper towels in the women's restroom. Hand dryer works but a lot of people prefer towels. Also noticed by another guest (separately reported).

updates.message: Acknowledged—routing to janitorial restock.
Restocked paper towels and added an extra backup pack in the cabinet.

issues.description: Two overhead lights are flickering in the 2nd floor open office near the north windows.

reports.body: Lights flicker intermittently (especially in the afternoon). It's distracting during calls.
Same area—noticed one fixture is dim and then flashes bright.

updates.message: Facilities notified; ordering replacement ballast/LED driver for fixture.
Technician scheduled for this week; may require ladder access after hours.

comments.body: I put a wet floor sign there but it got moved—please keep one nearby.

issues.description: Water pooling near the lobby entrance on rainy days; floor gets slippery by the mat edge.

reports.body: Rainwater is getting past the mat and pooling. Almost slipped walking in.
Rainwater is getting past the mat and pooling. Almost slipped walking in. Also noticed by another guest (separately reported).

updates.message: Acknowledged—placing additional absorbent mats and wet floor signage.
Added a second mat and adjusted door sweep; monitoring during next rain.
No pooling observed after adjustments; closing out.

issues.description: Conference Room B runs very cold during meetings; thermostat seems unresponsive.

reports.body: Room B is freezing even when set to 72. Feels like air is blasting constantly.

updates.message: Acknowledged—checking VAV box and thermostat calibration.

issues.description: Recycling bin overflowing in the 3rd floor breakroom; cardboard stacked next to it.

reports.body: Recycling is full and people are leaving boxes on the floor. Smells a bit too.
Recycling is full and people are leaving boxes on the floor. Smells a bit too. Also noticed by another guest (separately reported).

updates.message: Janitorial notified for immediate pickup; adding extra cardboard pickup on Fridays.
Cleared overflow and removed cardboard; bin liner replaced.

comments.body: If this happens again, please note the time so we can pull access logs.

issues.description: Badge reader at the side entrance intermittently fails; requires multiple taps to unlock.

reports.body: Badge reader flashes red even with valid badge. Took 5 tries this morning.
Same issue at ~8:40am. Eventually worked but seems flaky.

updates.message: Acknowledged—security vendor contacted to inspect reader and wiring.
Temporary fix applied (cleaned contacts, reseated connector). Monitoring for recurrence.

issues.description: Lobby QR code poster links to an old form; users get a 404 page.

reports.body: Scanned the QR in the lobby and it goes to a dead link (404).
Scanned the QR in the lobby and it goes to a dead link (404). Also noticed by another guest (separately reported).

issues.description: Carpet stain in the 2nd floor hallway near Conference Room A; looks like old coffee spill.

reports.body: There’s a noticeable brown stain in the hallway carpet by Conf A. Been there for weeks.
There’s a noticeable brown stain in the hallway carpet by Conf A. Been there for weeks. Also noticed by another guest (separately reported).

updates.message: Added to carpet spot-cleaning list for this week.
Spot cleaned; stain significantly reduced. Scheduling deeper extraction next monthly clean.
Deep extraction completed; stain removed.

issues.description: Elevator call button on 1st floor is sticky; sometimes doesn't register a press.

reports.body: The up button feels stuck and doesn't always light up when pressed.
The up button feels stuck and doesn't always light up when pressed. Also noticed by another guest (separately reported).

updates.message: Acknowledged—submitted service request to elevator maintenance vendor.

issues.description: Pothole forming near the garage exit lane; drivers swerve to avoid it.

reports.body: Pothole near the exit is getting bigger. Could damage tires.

updates.message: Acknowledged—getting quote from paving contractor; placed cone as temporary warning.
Contractor scheduled for patch repair next available window (weather dependent).

issues.description: Wayfinding sign to 'Training Room' points the wrong direction on 2nd floor.

reports.body: The arrow for Training Room sends people toward the stairwell instead of the west corridor.
The arrow for Training Room sends people toward the stairwell instead of the west corridor. Also noticed by another guest (separately reported).

updates.message: Confirmed incorrect arrow; ordering replacement insert.
Replaced sign insert; verified direction from both ends of hallway.

issues.description: Fire extinguisher cabinet in 3rd floor hallway appears empty (no extinguisher visible).

reports.body: Cabinet glass shows no extinguisher inside. Not sure if it's missing or relocated.
Cabinet glass shows no extinguisher inside. Not sure if it's missing or relocated. Also noticed by another guest (separately reported).

updates.message: Acknowledged—checking inspection tags and confirming with safety vendor; will replace immediately if missing.

comments.body: If you can, please share the approximate time window so we can correlate with mechanical cycles.

issues.description: Intermittent loud rattling noise from ceiling vent near the 2nd floor kitchenette.

reports.body: Rattling/buzzing from the vent for ~10 minutes at a time. Happens a few times a day.
Rattling/buzzing from the vent for ~10 minutes at a time. Happens a few times a day. Also noticed by another guest (separately reported).

updates.message: Inspected vent grille; found loose fastener. Tightened and added foam tape to reduce vibration.
No further noise reported; closing.

issues.description: Loose floor transition strip at the 1st floor corridor near the mailroom; edge is lifting.

reports.body: Metal strip between tile and carpet is lifting. Caught my shoe on it.
Metal strip between tile and carpet is lifting. Caught my shoe on it. Also noticed by another guest (separately reported).

locations.full_path: HQ / 2nd Floor / Conference Rooms / Conference Room B
locations.name: Conference Room B
